tasks.title: Set up Project Environment
tasks.description: Install dependencies, set up repository, and configure development tools.
tasks.details: npm init, yarn install, create-react-app, etc.

subtasks.title: Initialize Project
subtasks.description: Run npm init to create a new project and set up the basic structure.
subtasks.details: Use npm init to create a new project, then follow the prompts to set up the project name, version, and author.

subtasks.title: Install Dependencies
subtasks.description: Run yarn install or npm install to install the required dependencies for the project.
subtasks.details: Use yarn install or npm install to install the dependencies listed in the package.json file.

subtasks.title: Set up Repository
subtasks.description: Create a new repository on GitHub or another version control system and link it to the project.
subtasks.details: Create a new repository, then add the remote tracking branch by running git remote add origin <repository-url>.

subtasks.title: Configure Development Tools
subtasks.description: Set up development tools such as code editors and debuggers to work with the project.
subtasks.details: Install and configure your preferred code editor, debugger, and other development tools.

subtasks.title: Verify Project Setup
subtasks.description: Run tests or verify that the project is set up correctly by running a simple command.
subtasks.details: Run npm test or yarn test to verify that the project is set up correctly and all dependencies are installed.

tasks.title: Develop Backend API with Flask
tasks.description: Create a Flask server and integrate the eBay Finding API.
tasks.details: Flask app setup, eBay API integration, error handling

tasks.title: Implement Search Screen with React
tasks.description: Create a search bar and call the backend API to fetch results.
tasks.details: React component setup, Axios calls, data rendering

tasks.title: Develop Results Screen with React
tasks.description: Display item title, thumbnail image, market prices, and confidence metrics.
tasks.details: React component setup, data rendering, styling

tasks.title: Implement Saved Items Screen with React
tasks.description: Allow users to save items and view saved items later.
tasks.details: React component setup, SQLite CRUD operations, data rendering
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of saved items feature

tasks.title: Develop Settings / About Page with React
tasks.description: Create a static page with app description, instructions, and future roadmap teaser.
tasks.details: React component setup, data rendering, styling

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design for Mobile and Desktop
tasks.description: Ensure the app is responsive and loads within 2 seconds.
tasks.details: Tailwind CSS setup, media queries, performance optimization
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of responsiveness and load times

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling for Failed API Calls
tasks.description: Handle errors and exceptions when calling the eBay Finding API.
tasks.details: Error handling setup, try-catch blocks, logging

tasks.title: Implement Secure Storage of API Keys
tasks.description: Store API keys securely using environment variables.
tasks.details: Environment variable setup, secure storage implementation
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of secure key storage

tasks.title: Implement SQLite CRUD Operations for Saved Items
tasks.description: Create a SQLite database and implement CRUD operations for saved items.
tasks.details: SQLite setup, CRUD operations implementation, data rendering

tasks.title: Implement Price Tracking Alerts (Future Feature)
tasks.description: Create a feature to track price changes and send alerts.
tasks.details: Price tracking setup, alert system implementation
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of price tracking feature

tasks.title: Implement Multi-Platform Integration (Future Feature)
tasks.description: Integrate with multiple platforms, such as Poshmark and Depop.
tasks.details: API integration setup, data rendering, styling

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication with Cloud Storage (Future Feature)
tasks.description: Create a user authentication system and store saved items in the cloud.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of user authentication feature

tasks.title: Implement Mobile App Version (Future Feature)
tasks.description: Create a mobile app version using React Native or Flutter.
tasks.details: Mobile app setup, data rendering, styling
tasks.testStrategy: Manual testing of mobile app feature

tasks.title: Test and Debug the App
tasks.description: Perform manual testing and debugging to ensure the app meets acceptance criteria.
